title: Asante - Bible (Book)
description: Asante translation of the Bible published by the Bible Society of Ghana in 2012. Asante is a minority language spoken in Ghana.

language.name: Akan
language.area: Asante are south central, Ashanti Province; Akuapem are southeast, north of Accra; Fante are south central, between Winneba, Takoradi, and Obuasi.
